ISSUE.TITLE: Sales Summary Report - incorrect profit calculation
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.60 > with new installation with sample data, create a product with product cost. > checkout the new product. > view the sales summary report group by day. The profit and order total are the same when the profit should be lesser than order total. > > The problem happens when there are multiple orders in a day, the profit calculation is done by selecting the top 1 order of that day. Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/topic/97650/sales-summary-report-profit-calculation-and-filtering

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #6793 Fixed profit calculation in the Sales Summary Report.
